MajorClaims.Text: criminal minds that breed violence not stringent gun control
there is a poor relationship between polices carrying guns and an increasing violence rate

Claims.Text: criminal mind seems to be more related to violence
if there is gun control somehow crime has to decrease
stringent gun control does not decrease violence and crime
if a government wants to control crime in a community, it is important to manage their people's actions rather than gun used in violent crimes

Premises.Text: fewer guns available mean less crime
this is not as simple as it sounds
most gun violence is committed with guns obtained illegally
People who are intent to commit crime and control cities through gang violence and other means will find a way to continue to use guns, regardless of gun control
the root of violence is criminal mind not the weapon itself
there will be law non-abiding people anywhere in the world, either polices or common citizens
